Try GOMPlayer.

I downloaded the source avi that this release used, then ran it through AviSynth with the decomb plugin and simply used one single filter: decimate()
This restored the choppy 29.97fps video to a smooth 23.976fps, played back great and the Korean subs didn't distract from the film at all.
thanks for the up, 1/5th of fram missing to remove subs, but it is a plot driven movie so not much missing apart from chins!!
